item.title: Create user, datebase and grant permission in MySQL/PostgreSQL
Own IRC Server on Debian with Anope and MySQL
item.description: ** Pre-Installation ** First, download the UnrealIRCd source, located here wget http://www.unrealircd.com/downloads/Unreal3.2.10.1.tar.gz wget http://www.unrealircd.com/pgp/Unreal3.2.10.1.tar.gz.asc After you install it, run a few checks on the gzip file to make sure it is the secured version. gpg --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 0x9FF03937 gpg --verify Unreal3.2.10.1.tar.gz.asc Unreal3.2.10.1.tar.gz Next, we have to extract the contents of the compressed file. Type tar zxvf Unreal3.2.10.1.tar.gz ** SSL Support If you want users to be able to connect to your IRC server via a secure connection, you will need to install a package called libcurl4-openssl-dev.
